title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an iron skewer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing an iron skewer in a dream indicates achieving goals and increasing many livelihoods. Seeing an iron skewer in a dream can indicate self-development and the desire for new things to happen. The dreamer is doing a good job, and God knows best. Also, seeing an iron skewer in a dream may indicate the disappearance of worries and sorrows, turning to God Almighty, and facilitating the affairs of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream for a single woman: If a single girl dreams of seeing an iron skewer in a dream, this means that she will achieve the goals and ambitions that she is trying to achieve. Achieving it. Also, this vision may indicate that she will soon marry a good man who will make her happy in her next life, and this suits her. Seeing an iron skewer in a dream means the success and wonderful excellence that she will achieve in her life, as well as removing burdens and misfortunes in her next life. If you see an iron skewer in In a dream, this may indicate that she is a social girl who loves social relationships and will enter into a new relationship and end up in a good marriage, God willing. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of seeing many iron bars, this indicates the collapse of disputes and worries that She suffered from it in the previous period, and God knows best. Also, seeing an iron skewer for a married woman indicates the achievement of desired goals and hopes, and a lot of hard work that she will do, and God knows best. Seeing an iron skewer in a dream means that she will soon give birth to a child who is healthy and free from all diseases, But also the happiness that he will experience. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is buying iron skewers, this vision does not bode well, as it indicates the coming of evil and things that are not intended to be. Also, seeing iron bars in a woman’s dream For a pregnant woman, it indicates facilitating her upcoming affairs, facilitating her birth, and stopping the pain she suffers from during labor. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream for a man: If the Merciful One sees in his dream that he is buying an iron skewer, this means that he has committed many sins, and has not repented for them, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As Seeing an iron skewer in a dream indicates that he will marry a pious and obedient girl who will obey him and her family and will not do anything of disobedience or disobedience. Also, seeing an iron skewer in a dream may indicate achieving good and just goals, joining a new job and saving good and abundant money from it. An iron in a dream may indicate many livelihoods, the abundance of halal money, and many upcoming charitable works that the dreamer will do in his life. Interpretation of a dream about an iron wire coming out of the mouthInterpretation of seeing an iron wire coming out of the mouth in a dream is evidence of bad words coming out of that person’s mouth He needs to choose his words. Seeing a wire coming out of the mouth in a dream also indicates the difficult days that a person will experience in the next period of his life. If you had a dream that you want to understand,

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about praying in a dream by leading scholars and translators. Prayer is one of the pillars of Islam, and praying and leaving the mosque, as the dream interpretation of praying without a head covering is generally desirable and indicates the extent of one’s faith. To interpret the dream of seeing prayer in a dream this dream, we will know it in detail at this time by obtaining a better interpretation according to the leading Arab translators and scholars. We also deal with what is the vision of prayer for single, married and pregnant women, and the interpretation of the vision of prayer in the church. Interpretation of the dream of seeing prayer by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin noted in his interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream that it is desirable and indicates good news and an answer to the prayer of the one who sees it. The interpretation of the dream of prayer indicates the fulfillment of a covenant. The dreamer. If you see in a dream that he is praying the Fajr prayer, this is a sign of the fulfillment of his wishes. Interpretation of a dream about Friday prayer. This vision shows the proximity of the Gulf to the dreamer. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is praying the Eid prayer, his vision indicates that he is in exile, and this is a sign of his return. From exile. Whoever sees in his dream that he is praying the Eid al-Fitr prayer, his vision indicates an abundance of food. As for the one who sees in a dream that he is praying the Eid al-Adha prayer, his vision indicates that the dreamer has many debts, and his vision indicates disposing of and paying his debts. As for Whoever dreams that he is performing prayer, this dream indicates that the dreamer is preparing for something, perhaps such as marriage, Hajj, or building a house. As for the one who dreams that he is kneeling in prayer, this vision indicates that the dreamer has repented of something annoying that he did, and this vision repented of that. The matter. Interpretation of a dream about prayer and worship. Interpretation of prayer in a dream and prayer in a dream indicates the return of someone he loves from his absence. As for the interpretation of a dream about prayer and prostration in a dream, it is evidence of the disappearance of worries and debts. Interpretation of a dream about prayer on the Day of Resurrection in a dream is evidence that the time has passed. On repentance and returning to God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing supplication by Al-Nabulsi: The dreamer who sees himself praying on Friday but did not do so in the dream is an indication that he will be fired from his job or job. As for the interpretation of a dream about praying in shrines, it is evidence of the satisfaction of his needs and the abundance of food. Al-Nabulsi explained that He sees praying behind the imam and does not hear his voice, this indicates his death. As for the woman who saw in her dream that she is praying in front of the man, this is evidence of her death. Likewise, the interpretation of the dream is that he prays and begs in a dream to give birth to a just and good child with his parents. As for seeing the dreamer shedding tears in Solemn prayer, it is evidence that worries and problems will disappear, and his condition will improve for the better. Likewise, the dreamer who sees that he desires to pray and seeks the direction of prayer, but does not find it in his dream, indicates that he is very confused about something. As for seeing the dreamer praying until sunset The sun, this is evidence of its rare presence in his religion. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman praying as if she is praying on Friday, then seeing it indicates the nearness of marriage. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the mosque for an unmarried woman, and proof of her obtaining etc.

title: Interpretation of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a Christmas tree by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a Christmas tree in a dream means happy circumstances and events. He also said that it refers to the holidays, but there is sadness watching it. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing it symbolizes good luck, may God grant you success for the dreamer. Anyone who sees a Christmas tree with many candles is a sign On the occurrence of a major accident.Who knows birthday gifts in a dream, it is an unpleasant vision.The meaning of a dream of celebrating a birthdayWho dreams of celebrating a birthday in a dream is a sign of good news.When you see his birthday party is big and has a lot of people, gifts and joy, this is a sign of changing the dreamer’s situation from worse and less Material level. Seeing a Christmas jar “Christmas” indicates a happy new life. As Ibn Sirin said, seeing it expresses a new opportunity. Be a reason to change the dreamer’s life for the better, personally and practically. Seeing a Sidr tree in a dream symbolizes a happy event. The concept of a dream about Christmas in a dreamAny person Dreaming of a birthday or a happy occasion in which it indicates the gathering of the latent desire of the dreamer’s soul to achieve ambitions. Attending someone’s birthday party Trips In reality, it is a sign of his return. Interpretation of the vision of Christmas for single people Seeing Christmas in a dream, alone, indicates that success and excellence. A single woman appears who sees her fiancé giving her A golden ring on her birthday that she is comingBook History. Dreaming of a birthday party in a dream about a married woman. A married woman who dreams of seeing guests in her house to celebrate her birthday with gifts, this is a sign of happy events and good news for her and her family. Who do you see celebrating? Her son’s birthdayIn the dream, it is good to Pregnancy will happen soon. Whoever sees herself celebrating her husband’s birthday in a dream indicates a change in his life for the better and the nearness of receiving a large sum of money, including an inheritance. As for celebrating her husband’s birthday in a dream, it will also be a sign of his recovery from illness. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the condition. Social media in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation and interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream: Eating grape leaves is considered a delicious food, as it is preferred by many and desired by adults and children. Rice with vegetables or minced meat, then we wrap it and then cook it. This food is distinguished by its wonderful sour taste. What is the interpretation of grape leaves in a dream? Interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream for a single woman. Eating grape leaves is considered one of the popular dishes widespread in the Arab countries, and some consider it a type of appetizer. It is placed next to the main dishes, and seeing it in a dream for a single girl indicates that she has wisdom in managing her affairs. A single girl has the ability to act wisely and responsibly in making decisions in her life. Likewise, she has a good husband who helps her with life’s problems, when she sees in her dream that she is rotting and eating grape leaves. She also lives her life with happiness and stability, and may God bless her life. She is also going through some difficult circumstances. , when she sees in her dream that its color has turned black. Moreover, she reaches the highest ranks in her studies and achieves great achievements when she sees in her dream that she is eating grape leaves. Moreover, this girl faces some difficulties in her life if she sees that Her color has turned black. She also finds a new job, and if she is already working, she will get a promotion in her job. If she is sick, she will recover from the illness she was suffering from. In addition, she earns money without getting tired or worrying about bringing it, As an heir to money from her family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about falling down the stairs for a single woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream for a man. Grape leaves in a dream indicate the health that a person will gain, kindness, and money that will be given to earn a living. A person is blessed with goodness and abundance of money in his life when he sees leaves Grapes in a dream. It also removes the fears and problems that he suffers from in his life when he sees them cooked in a dream. The same applies to a man in good and abundant food, and he gets rid of his debts when he sees that he is buying them for his wife. In addition, he will suffer from problems and a difficult financial situation when he chews them and has It tastes bad. Moreover, an unmarried young man receives a happy stage in his life when he sees that a beautiful woman is offering him a dish of it. Also, if this person is sick, he will recover from his illness and be healthy. He also earns a lot of money and profits from his work when he sees Green grape leaves after cooking. In addition, he is freed from the worries and sorrows that accompanied him in his life. This man will also get a new job if he sees that he is eating stuffed grape leaves. See also: Interpretation of a dream about frying fish in a dream in detail. Seeing cooked grape leaves. This food is considered one of the most delicious Foods because of their delicious taste, and whoever sees this vision in his dream shows that he can manage the affairs of his life with great wisdom, as well as bear responsibility for the affairs of his home. The problems and worries that existed between the husband and his wife disappear and they live together in happiness and stability. Also, it is possible

title: Interpretation of a Sudanese dream and seeing it in a dream about a man and a woman

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of dreams about peanuts and seeing them in a dream for men and women. Peanuts are considered one of the best types of nuts available to many people and their taste is wonderful. Dreams have very different interpretations from each other, and now we will explain the details of the interpretation of the Sudanese dream, whether in the dream of a married or unmarried man or woman, because the interpretation differs in each case. Interpretation of a Sudanese dream in a dream: Eating beans in a dream indicates abundance and goodness. The person who buys a lot of Sudanese He will enjoy a lot of food and see goodness in something. Peanuts in a woman’s dream are good, but the interpretation differs for married and single women. Sudanese numbers about increasing money and health. Seeing peanuts in a dream is evidence of getting rid of family problems. Eating peanuts in a dream indicates a lack Money. Seeing roasted peanuts in a dream indicates the arrival of good news for the pioneer. Roasting beans in a dream indicates comprehensive nutrition. Whoever sees a lot of beans in a dream, this is evidence of the good deeds he performs. Interpretation of a dream for a married Sudanese woman. A married woman who sees a Sudanese man In a dream, you will live in abundance. See the Sudanese inside the dream. For a married woman, pregnancy is approaching. If you see a Sudanese tree in a married woman’s dream, this means that she is raising her children well. Seeing a married woman stacking peanuts and collecting them from the shop indicates an increase in kindness. A married woman dreams A Sudanese man gives birth to a child. Seeing a married woman throwing peanuts on the ground is evidence of an increase in livelihood. Interpretation of a Sudanese dream for a man: When a man dreams that he is eating peanuts, this means that he will get married in the same year. A man who sees himself in a dream that he is buying Sudanese, this indicates However, he donates halal money to charity. A man who sees in a dream that he is eating beans for a living, this is evidence of his desire to get married and thinking a lot about this matter. When a married man sees himself eating peanuts, his wife will give birth to a boy. The Sudanese interpretation of a girl is different. Married girl only When you see peanuts in a dream, this means that you will receive good news. Peanuts in a girl’s dream indicate that her marriage is approaching. To see peanuts in an unmarried woman’s dream means that God Almighty will give her a generous and righteous husband with high morals, and she will be happy with this marriage. Interpretation A Sudanese dream for a pregnant woman. Peanuts in a dream means good and pleasant skin. Peanuts indicate easy birth and that the fetus will be healthy. When a pregnant woman sees that she is eating peanuts, this is a sign that she has gotten rid of the disease and recovered. Green peanuts in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate The safety of carrying it. Interpretation of planting peanuts in a dream. Seeing Sudanese culture in a dream indicates that the dreamer will travel to a distant place to secure the future of his life and strive for neighborhood

title: Interpretation of a dream about a singles’ trip

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about flying can vary depending on the nature of the dream and the nature of the dreamer, whether he is male or female, and through the following lines we will show the dream about flying for free, the results and interpretations. Move around, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about a singles’ flightWhen a single woman sees in her dream, she dreams of flying. This indicates that he has great ambitions, as it shows that he has more will and strong determination. When he sees a single woman in her sleep, he flies. This may indicate Indicates that she will marry someone who can travel and leave her alone, which means that there will be long distances separating them. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is flying in the air accompanied by demons. This may indicate that she believes the words of charlatans to her. Therefore, it is a sign of the strength of her belief in superstitions and magic. , which may lead her to a dead end. When she sees singles, they are flying in the air. It may bring evidence that she will be happy in the near future. This may indicate her happiness with the person she saw in her dream, as well as the great benefits that she may gain from this person, In addition to the fact that it may be linked to a love relationship in the near future. Many dream interpreters believe that if a single woman sees in her dream that she is flying and moving from her home to the home of someone she knows. Perhaps confirmation of her marriage to one of the people of this house will be soon. Interpretation of a dream about flying without Wings for individuals While an unmarried woman dreams that she is flying without wings. This may indicate that she has greater intelligence that helps her achieve all her dreams quickly. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is flying without wings. This may indicate that her condition will change from one state to another from By making a simple effort. When he sees an unmarried woman in his dream, he flies without wings. This may mean that he will undermine the goals he was pursuing. It also indicates that she achieves all her desires without putting in more effort and hardship. When he sees an unmarried woman in his dream , he flies with wings. This is an indication that he will travel outside the country, God willing, on work or on a trip. If an unmarried woman sees that she is a woman flying in her dream over a mountain. This may be a sign that he will obtain an excellent position and enjoy a high status soon. When a woman dreams When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is trying to fly, but she cannot do it. This may mean that there is a problem in her life that needs to be fixed. We have chosen For you: Interpretation of seeing flying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of flying for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicates in his interpretations that when an unmarried woman flies with a wing, this expression is stronger than the one without a wing. As this indicates progress in her life through money, lineage, or Beauty, knowledge, or other things. Ibn Sirin believes that if an unmarried woman sees a woman in her dream, she flies. This may indicate that she is traveling or moving from a bad situation to a better one than she is in. Ibn Sirin says

title: Interpretation of meat in a dream: It is in a dream

preview.html: Meaning of salted meat: Hard work and eating raw meat in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of bacon or salted meat in a dream. Seeing an old man in a dream indicates great patience and endurance in matters related to the surroundings. Qad is a symbol of anxiety, sadness, weakness, illness, and gossip. Gossip and abuse. An old man in a dream can refer to things and things that have been put on hold and the time has not yet come to complete them. The old Ghanimah blames the dead and everyone who eats salted, lean meat loses his money. Seeing the dead in one dream does not deserve praise because it expresses the avarice and avarice of men. An unmarried woman sees in her dream that she You salt meat or eat garbage, so you will live a difficult life with a miser. It is not good in visions for a girl to feed a strange old man being prepared in her father’s house. It is not good to buy it from the market and she hates seeing salt with meat in general. The old man in a dream of an unmarried woman. Patience and the amount is the money saved If the dreamer eats it and drinks water after it in the dream, it is good or beneficial. Dough cooked with broth or eaten with bread indicates fatigue and great hardship in earning or dieting. The best thing that a single girl can see is dried fruits placed or preserved in oil. A dream for a married woman indicates Due to the scarcity of resources and the lack of money or spending, there is no benefit in eating or buying, and the commentators differed regarding its preparation or preparation. The rest is illusion and fatigue, and the rest is skill in managing money or investing it. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is cutting meat into small slices, then salting it, then leaving it to dry in the sun. It is an act of goodness or work that protects her children or her husband. And what she sees is curing meat, then the money saved will happen. Fresh meat is money, inheritance, or spoils, and it is praised to see it at the time of Eid or Hajj or in general on religious occasions. Meat in a pregnant woman’s dream. Any food or meat. Salted in the dreams of a pregnant woman is good and good, because a little salt heals and the meat is tender. If a pregnant woman sees herself eating it, then dried fruits may indicate a male baby. Drying and preserving meat is an expression of safety and security, and this interpretation applies only to pregnant women and not to all other women. The old man in a dream The man symbolizes scarcity and miserliness or hardship and hardship. Money is tiring, and it is said about it as a blessing. If the dreamer sees it being prepared and sold instead of meat cooked in oil, then he is worthy of praise. Interpretation of eating meat in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a ram

preview.html: Dreaming of a ram in a dream has many connotations, such as a huge man, a sultan, a prince, or an imam. It also symbolizes a shepherd, and you may also recognize a child in a dream, or a muezzin, as seeing this dream varies from person to person or according to the place and time of the dreamer, It varies from pregnant woman to married woman, unmarried girl, etc. Interpretation of this dream through this article. Interpretation of a dream about a ram and its sacrifice by Ibn Sirin. Among the visions worthy of praise and promising comfort, righteousness, and blessings to their owner. Interpretation of a dream about sacrifice in a dream according to Nabulsi. It is an indicator of recovery from illness and enjoyment of health. Slaughtering a ram and its sacrifice in a dream. It is not one of the good visions for its owner. It means injustice. Distributing or stealing the sacrifice in a dream. Distributing meat in a dream indicates halal and good nutrition, and stealing meat means cheating. Slaughtering a ram in a dream is a good vision that is a sign of resolving problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about the Eid sacrifice dying before slaughter expresses loss to the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about a ram in a dream. A dream about a ram. In a dream, seeing a ram in a dream has many interpretations and gossip, which can be summarized as follows: When a person sees that he is slaughtering a ram and does not know who slaughtered it, this is a sign of a man who bears witness to the truth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for seeing the slaughter of cows and camels, it is a sign that the owner The dream will mean that he will repent and return to God Almighty and confess his sin, and if he has a debt, he will pay his debt and come closer to God. As for seeing a ram in a war, this is evidence that he defeats the enemies and kills them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But when a person sees a ram hitting him in a dream, this is a sign of... He will suffer from harm or infection. Whoever sees that he is skinning a ram, this is a sign that the dream is a difference between his wealth and a great man. As for seeing the fat and wool of rams, this is a sign of goodness, abundance of money, and Ibn Mubarak, God willing. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Seeing a ram in a woman’s dream Single woman: Seeing a ram for a single woman shows many signs, which are summarized as follows: When an unmarried woman sees a ram in a dream, this is a sign that she is close to marrying a person of good character. But if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that a ram is chasing her, this is a sign that There is someone who wants to relate to her and think about her. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating lamb, this is a sign of happiness and a lot of money in the next period of her life. When an unmarried woman sees many animals in a dream, this is a sign that there are He wants to harm her and is waiting for her, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ram in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a ram for a married woman has many interpretations and rumors about this dream, including: If a married woman sees that one of her relatives is giving her a sheep, then this Evidence of money, benefit, and abundant livelihood from that person. But when a married woman sees a ram hitting her in a dream, this is evidence of the existence of many problems between her and her husband, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if a married woman sees in a dream that

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing planets and stars in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadota website offers you the complete interpretation of seeing planets in a dream, which are the planets of the solar system in the sky, and each planet corresponds to its name, and planet Earth is the only planet on which life exists. Life, and whoever sees the appearance of complete planets in a dream, this indicates the death of the dreamer or the death of a relative or loved one, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing planets and stars in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a person in a dream about solar planets, this indicates the collapse of fears and disputes that were ongoing. Also, seeing Full planets and stars in a dream indicate a new life free of problems and diseases, and God knows best. Seeing full planets in a dream means a high position, a peaceful life, sustenance, and a lot of money and profits from trade. Likewise, if a married man sees in a dream that all the stars are descending To the earth, this indicates that he is righteous and repents to God. The interpretation of seeing Saturn in a dream is complete for a woman in general. If a girl sees in her dream a bowl of planets and stars, this indicates her success and excellence in her studies, and God knows best. Also, seeing the planets and stars in a dream full of a woman’s bowl indicates Her close marriage to a good man who is devoted to his religion. If the girl sees the planet of the bowl shining and shining, this indicates joy, happiness and a lot of happiness that she sees. And seeing the planet for the general girl, it shows the loss of her worries and problems and the good work that she will do. Interpretation of seeing the planets in a dream in full for a woman Married: If a married woman sees bright stars and planets in her dream, this indicates the happiness she sees in her life with movement and travel. Also, seeing the entire planet Venus in a dream indicates that her husband will enter a new job and that she will soon become pregnant with a beautiful baby. Also, if a married woman sees stars and planets In her dream, this indicates her victory in the battles that her husband will soon win. As for seeing the entire planet Mars in a dream, this indicates the many worries and troubles that she will fall into, and the anguish and imprisonment of her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing planets in a dream for a pregnant woman: for a pregnant woman to see in her sleep And she sees the stars and goes down to her room, this indicates the date of her birth and the ease of childbirth, and God knows best. Also, seeing many stars in a complete dream indicates the end of her worries and problems and that she will give birth to a child free of diseases. Seeing Saturn in a dream full of peopleIf the average man dreams of seeing Planets and stars, this indicates the high status with which he shines, and God knows best. Also, seeing bright stars in a dream indicates the death of worries and problems and a close and blessed marriage to a good girl. If a person sees in a dream full of stars falling from the sky, this indicates an illness from which he suffers. The dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing space and planets in a dream. Interpretation of seeing space travel and seeing planets in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will move to a better life full of success and progress. Seeing planets falling from space in a full dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicate Problems and misfortunes for the pioneer. My visions are complete

title: What you have never heard of is to see bricks in a dream

preview.html: Brick in a dream The interpretation of a dream about bricks in a dream is one of the most important interpretations that causes panic and anxiety for people, so when they see bricks in a dream, people rush to find out the truth of this vision. So that they are aware of their situation and that this vision does not remain a source of worry in their lives, and seeing bricks in a dream varies depending on the state in which the bricks were in the dream. The vision was only of bricks only, or seeing bricks building, or breaking bricks, and also different according to the type of bricks, as it is red or white. Or clay bricks, and also according to the seer, a man’s vision is not the same as a woman’s vision, and a married woman’s vision is not the same as an unmarried or pregnant woman. Let us learn about the interpretation of bricks in a dream through our Egyptian website. Brick in a dream Brick in a dream is a symbol of power and greatness. If a man sees Dream about bricks. This indicates the strength of this man in his life, and what is meant here is physical strength. Instead, it is the strength that comes from influence or comes from the scientific or practical position of the individual. But if a man sees a brick in a dream. This indicates the stability of this man’s opinion and that he is not convinced by anyone’s opinion, but he is very attached to his opinion, and does not care about what people say. But if he dreams that he is building bricks; This indicates that this person has been planning for his future life for a long time. He has drawn in his mind a picture of what he will do in his life, and this, if necessary, indicates this man’s awareness and that his life only proceeds according to well-thought-out plans, and this will be said. God willing, this man will succeed. But if a person sees in his dream that he is establishing a house and he is the one who is building it; This is evidence that this person is planning actions that he will take in the future, and that God Almighty has authorized him to achieve these actions well. But if a person sees in a dream that he trembles when building bricks. This indicates that this man is distracted in his life and is not good at dealing with life matters. He cannot make fatal decisions in his life. But if the man sees red bricks in his dream, this indicates the stability of this man’s position and that he does not change his position or opinions, regardless of the circumstances surrounding him. This indicates the honesty of this person, not being affected by what is going on around him, and not exposing his opinion to whims and desires. However, if a woman sees in her dream that she is building a house, this indicates that this woman will achieve what she dreamed of and what she planned for, and this, if it is pointed out, indicates good thinking. This woman, her good behavior, and her ability to confront her own situations and think of appropriate solutions to avoid those situations. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of red bricksIbn Sirin is one of the famous scholars of dream interpretation. Ibn Sirin worked hard to interpret the vision of bricks in a dream, and he said: Red bricks in a dream are a symbol of pride, strength, solidity, and superiority. If a man sees red bricks in his dream, this indicates that this man has the qualities of superiority, pride, and strength. This strength may come from his personality or It may come from his influence. This happens if this man occupies a high position in society or if one of his relatives has power, influence and rank, then this man’s influence and power stem from that relative.
